participant_1.background:
My pets are a source of endless inspiration for my writing.
I have a house with a home gym so my kids can visit me when they want.
i am the youngest of 4 children.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.
I enjoy the thrill of playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang.

participant_2.background:
I do not play an instrument, but I love to sing along to country music with my fiancé on the weekends.
I watch Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it.
I enjoy tinkering with my car, working on it in the garage and fixing it up.
my mother is a teacher in the city.
i am an animal rights activist.

content.text: Hello! What are you interested in?
I am an animal rights activist. What about you?
I love writing, teaching, and traveling.
Wow, those are great passions! Do you write books or short stories?
I write short stories and poetry. I have two published books as well.
That is awesome! What kind of subjects do you write about?
I write about my life, my family, and my pets.
I love hearing about people's lives. Do you have any pets?
I have two cats and a dog. They are my best friends.
That sounds amazing. I would love to have a pet.
I live in an apartment and my landlord doesn't allow pets.
That's too bad. I'm sure you would be a great pet owner.
